text: So I have this theory that we're all innately attracted to the sound of the human voice,
even if we don't recognize it as a voice, which is why you should make your voice into an instrument.
And my favorite way to do that is with bouncy notes.
This is the most underrated Ableton device.
As you can see, the notes are bouncing. I'm turning up the gravity,
and tying the gravity to the velocity of the notes, and I get this.
Ableton is actually having a sale right now for US customers, so if that's you, click the link in my bio.
